name: Super Cube Smash
description: Super cube smash is a rhythmic action game that generates music as you play. It is set on the mysterious ancient spaceship 'The Dawrfstone' where the most peculiar and unfortunate of events have occurred.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Vram (eg. GeForceGT 610) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1640 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A8-7600 (Quad Core) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DDR5 Vram (Radeon HD 6800) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1640 MB available space
